name: excretion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of getting rid of material such as solid waste or urine from the body: Excretion is one of several activities common to both plants and animals. Eating too much salt causes the excretion of excessive amounts of calcium. See
excrete
More examplesFewer examplesIn an aquarium containing growing fish, the ammonia excretion levels are high. The lymphatic system ensures that harmful substances reach the kidneys for excretion. Sugar increases excretion of B vitamins and the minerals magnesium and chromium.
